name: Light Attack!
description:
Survive to the assault of the lightness, and embrace the darkness !

Controls (keyboard only) :

Left/Right : Left and Right Arrow

Jump : Up Arrow

FlashLightAttack : Left click mouse

Sound used :

Effect sounds are from the royalty free of soniss.com - Bank Sound of GDC 2019

Music from Youtube Library royalty free music : "Croc - RalphReal"
